long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes any tweets on Twitter that contain a blue checkmark. See the attached screenshot for an example, where on a verified users page, no tweets appear at all. This extension impacts the feed, replies and notifications.
